pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/cp.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/cp/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install cp```#### Examples```python>>> import cp>>> cp.cp(src,dst)>>> cp.cp(src,dst) # skip, exists>>> cp.cp(src,dst,force=True) # force cp```
